segments.text: I see the water just pouring over the edge of the sink, creating a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how much water is on the floor already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just spreading out, making the floor all slippery and dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why she hasn't noticed the water yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit frustrating to watch, actually.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she realizes what's happening soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just going to keep spreading if she doesn't turn off the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such a mess being made.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will slip on the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR
